Sentencas: A three-dimensional image analysis tool has been developed to compute the effective conductivity of a particulate composite made of pores (material 0) and two materials (1) and (2).
Titulo: Effective transport properties of 3D multi-component microstructures with interface resistance

Sentencas: Three types of resistances are considered: the two resistances between materials (1)-(1) and (2)-(2) and the charge transfer resistance at the interface between materials (1) and (2).
Titulo: Effective transport properties of 3D multi-component microstructures with interface resistance

Sentencas: The numerical tool uses voxelised 3D numerical microstructures generated by discrete element simulations to mimic the particulate nature of the tested material.
Titulo: Effective transport properties of 3D multi-component microstructures with interface resistance

Sentencas: The method is validated by comparing its results to a resistance network model that incorporates interface resistance.
Titulo: Effective transport properties of 3D multi-component microstructures with interface resistance

Sentencas: The validation is conducted for both homogeneous and composite materials.
Titulo: Effective transport properties of 3D multi-component microstructures with interface resistance

Sentencas: Our tool has the advantage, compared with a resistance-network model, of allowing 3D tomography images to be treated.
Titulo: Effective transport properties of 3D multi-component microstructures with interface resistance

Sentencas: The method is applied to a microstructure typical of a composite Solid Oxide Fuel Cell cathode, however it is general enough to be a versatile tool for computing effective transport properties of any composite material where interface properties must be taken into account.
Titulo: Effective transport properties of 3D multi-component microstructures with interface resistance
